mapper.insert: insert into user_orders (merchant_uid, order_date, user_id) values (#{merchantUid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userId})
insert into user_orders_detail (merchant_uid, book_num, order_cnt) values (#{merchantUid}, #{bookNum}, #{cartCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_num, uod.order_cnt, b.book_name, b.book_img, b.author, b.discount, b.stock FROM book b JOIN user_orders_detail uod ON b.book_num = uod.book_num WHERE uod.merchant_uid = ${merchantUid}

SELECT b.book_num, uod.order_cnt, b.book_name, b.book_img, b.author, b.discount, b.stock FROM book b JOIN user_orders_detail uod ON b.book_num = uod.book_num WHERE uod.merchant_uid = ${merchantUid} ORDER BY uod.book_num ASC LIMIT 1
select * from user_orders where user_id = #{userId} and order_status != 0 order by order_date desc
